events.name: Future EV adoption
events.wd_description: Overcoming multiple barriers, including charging infrastructure, sufficient electricity generation, and the availability of battery raw materials at acceptable costs.

events.name: Charging infrastructure
events.wd_description: Building a network of charging stations to support widespread adoption.

events.name: Availability of battery raw materials
